CustomField.description: Formula based on ‘# of Donations this FY HC’ (Customizable Rollup) and ‘# of Donations this FY SC’ (DLRS). Soft credit is defined by OCR = Funder - Soft Credit, DAF, Workplace Giving, Sponsor, Agency. Qualifying stages = Received, Received as Unconditional Pledge, Received as Conditional Pledge. All Opp Record Types except PG. Only the master field should be accessible to users.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total count of all received Opportunities where the Close Date is this FY and Contact has a hard or soft credit. (Planned Gifts not included).
CustomField.label: # of Donations this FY
